name: InputNumber
description: InputNumber is an input component to provide numerical input.

button-layout.label: buttonLayout
button-layout.title: Layout of the buttons, valid values are "stacked" (default), "horizontal" and "vertical".

increment-button-class.label: incrementButtonClass
increment-button-class.title: Style class of the increment button.

decrement-button-class.label: decrementButtonClass
decrement-button-class.title: Style class of the decrement button.

increment-button-icon.label: incrementButtonIcon
increment-button-icon.title: Style class of the increment button.

decrement-button-icon.label: decrementButtonIcon
decrement-button-icon.title: Style class of the decrement button.

locale.label: locale
locale.title: Locale to be used in formatting.

locale-matcher.label: localeMatcher
locale-matcher.title: The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "lookup" and "best fit".

mode.label: mode
mode.title: Defines the behavior of the component, valid values are "decimal" and "currency".

prefix.label: prefix
prefix.title: Text to display before the value.

suffix.label: suffix
suffix.title: Text to display after the value.

currency.label: currency
currency.title: The currency to use in currency formatting. Possible values are the ISO 4217 currency codes, such as "USD" for the US dollar, "EUR" for the euro, or "CNY" for the Chinese RMB. There is no default value; if the style is "currency", the currency property must be provided.

currency-display.label: currencyDisplay
currency-display.title: How to display the currency in currency formatting. Possible values are "symbol" to use a localized currency symbol such as â‚¬, "code" to use the ISO currency code, "name" to use a localized currency name such as "dollar"; the default is "symbol".

use-grouping.label: useGrouping
use-grouping.title: Whether to use grouping separators, such as thousands separators or thousand/lakh/crore separators.

min-fraction-digits.label: minFractionDigits
min-fraction-digits.title: The minimum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number and percent formatting is 0; the default for currency formatting is the number of minor unit digits provided by the ISO 4217 currency code list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).

max-fraction-digits.label: maxFractionDigits
max-fraction-digits.title: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and 3; the default for currency formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and the number of minor unit digits provided by the ISO 4217 currency code list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).

step.label: step
step.title: Step factor to increment/decrement the value.

allow-empty.label: allowEmpty
allow-empty.title: Determines whether the input field is empty.

readonly.label: readonly
readonly.title: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

input-id.label: inputId
input-id.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

input-style.label: inputStyle
input-style.title: Inline style of the input field.

input-class.label: inputClass
input-class.title: Style class of the input field.

input-props.label: inputProps
input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

increment-button-props.label: incrementButtonProps
increment-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to increment button inside the component.

decrement-button-props.label: decrementButtonProps
decrement-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to decrement button inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: input
events.title: Callback to invoke when the value is entered.

events.name: focus
events.title: Callback to invoke on focus of input field.

events.name: blur
events.title: Callback to invoke on blur of input field.
